exp.libs.ui.layout

类 VFlowLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.FlowLayout
      • exp.libs.ui.layout.VFlowLayout
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    LayoutManager, Serializable

    public class VFlowLayout
extends FlowLayout
     垂直流式布局器

    PROJECT : exp-libs
    SUPPORT : https://exp-blog.com
    从以下版本开始:
    JDK 1.8+
    版本:
    2022-03-06
    作者:
    EXP: exp.lqb@foxmail.com
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int BOTTOM
      Specify the alignment to be bottom.
      static int MIDDLE
      Specify a middle alignment.
      static int TOP
      Specify alignment top.

      • 从类继承的字段 java.awt.FlowLayout

        CENTER, LEADING, LEFT, RIGHT, TRAILING

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      VFlowLayout()
      Construct a new VerticalFlowLayout with a middle alignment, and the fill to edge flag set.
      VFlowLayout(boolean hfill, boolean vfill)
      Construct a new VerticalFlowLayout with a middle alignment.
      VFlowLayout(int align)
      Construct a new VerticalFlowLayout with a middle alignment.
      VFlowLayout(int align, boolean hfill, boolean vfill)
      Construct a new VerticalFlowLayout.
      VFlowLayout(int align, int hgap, int vgap, boolean hfill, boolean vfill)
      Construct a new VerticalFlowLayout.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean getHorizontalFill()
      Returns true if the layout horizontally fills.
      boolean getVerticalFill()
      Returns true if the layout vertically fills.
      void layoutContainer(Container target)
      Lays out the container.
      Dimension minimumLayoutSize(Container target)
      Returns the minimum size needed to layout the target container.
      Dimension preferredLayoutSize(Container target)
      Returns the preferred dimensions given the components in the target container.
      void setHorizontalFill(boolean hfill)
      Set to true to enable horizontally fill.
      void setVerticalFill(boolean vfill)
      Set true to fill vertically.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • VFlowLayout

        public VFlowLayout()
        Construct a new VerticalFlowLayout with a middle alignment, and the fill to edge flag set.

      • VFlowLayout

        public VFlowLayout(boolean hfill,
                   boolean vfill)
        Construct a new VerticalFlowLayout with a middle alignment.
        参数:
        hfill - the fill to edge flag
        vfill - the vertical fill in pixels.

      • VFlowLayout

        public VFlowLayout(int align)
        Construct a new VerticalFlowLayout with a middle alignment.
        参数:
        align - the alignment value

      • VFlowLayout

        public VFlowLayout(int align,
                   boolean hfill,
                   boolean vfill)
        Construct a new VerticalFlowLayout.
        参数:
        align - the alignment value
        hfill - the horizontalfill in pixels.
        vfill - the vertical fill in pixels.

      • VFlowLayout

        public VFlowLayout(int align,
                   int hgap,
                   int vgap,
                   boolean hfill,
                   boolean vfill)
        Construct a new VerticalFlowLayout.
        参数:
        align - the alignment value
        hgap - the horizontal gap variable
        vgap - the vertical gap variable
        hfill - the fill to edge flag
        vfill - true if the panel should vertically fill.

        public Dimension preferredLayoutSize(Container target)
        Returns the preferred dimensions given the components in the target container.
        指定者:
        preferredLayoutSize 在接口中 LayoutManager
        覆盖:
        preferredLayoutSize 在类中 FlowLayout
        参数:
        target - the component to lay out

        public Dimension minimumLayoutSize(Container target)
        Returns the minimum size needed to layout the target container.
        指定者:
        minimumLayoutSize 在接口中 LayoutManager
        覆盖:
        minimumLayoutSize 在类中 FlowLayout
        参数:
        target - the component to lay out.
        返回:
        the minimum layout dimension.

      • setVerticalFill

        public void setVerticalFill(boolean vfill)
        Set true to fill vertically.
        参数:
        vfill - true to fill vertically.

      • getVerticalFill

        public boolean getVerticalFill()
        Returns true if the layout vertically fills.
        返回:
        true if vertically fills the layout using the specified.

      • setHorizontalFill

        public void setHorizontalFill(boolean hfill)
        Set to true to enable horizontally fill.
        参数:
        hfill - true to fill horizontally.

      • getHorizontalFill

        public boolean getHorizontalFill()
        Returns true if the layout horizontally fills.
        返回:
        true if horizontally fills.
